content:
IActorStateProvider IActorStateProvider Interface

In this Article

Edit

Represents the interface that an actor state provider needs to implement for actor runtime to communicate with it.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IActorStateProvider : IStateProviderReplicaPublic Interface IActorStateProvider
    Inherits IStateProviderReplica

Inherited Members

Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IStateProviderReplica

SaveReminderAsync(ActorId, IActorReminder, CancellationToken)

Saves the specified actor reminder. If an actor reminder with given name does not exist, it adds the actor reminder otherwise existing actor reminder with same name is updated.

Saves the specified set of actor state changes atomically.

    ActorActivatedAsync(ActorId, CancellationToken)
    ActorActivatedAsync(ActorId, CancellationToken)

    This method is invoked as part of the activation process of the actor with the specified Id. 

    Task ActorActivatedAsync(ActorId actorId, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function ActorActivatedAsync(actorId As ActorId, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

    Parameters

    • actorId
      ActorId
      ActorId

      ID of the actor that is activated.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A task that represents the asynchronous Actor activation notification processing.

    Exceptions

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    ContainsStateAsync(ActorId, String, CancellationToken)
    ContainsStateAsync(ActorId, String, CancellationToken)

    Checks whether actor state provider contains an actor state with specified state name.

    Task<bool> ContainsStateAsync(ActorId actorId, string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function ContainsStateAsync(actorId As ActorId, stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of Boolean)

    Parameters

    • actorId
      ActorId
      ActorId

      ID of the actor for which to check state existence.

    • stateName
      String
      String

      Name of the actor state to check for existence.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task<Boolean>
      Task(Of Boolean)

      A task that represents the asynchronous check operation. The value of TResult parameter is true if state with specified name exists otherwise false.

    Exceptions

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    DeleteReminderAsync(ActorId, String, CancellationToken)
    DeleteReminderAsync(ActorId, String, CancellationToken)

    Deletes the specified actor reminder if it exists.

    Task DeleteReminderAsync(ActorId actorId, string reminderName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function DeleteReminderAsync(actorId As ActorId, reminderName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

      ActorId

    • reminderName

      String

      Name of the reminder to delete.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A task that represents the asynchronous delete operation.

    Exceptions

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

  • Edit
    EnumerateStateNamesAsync(ActorId, CancellationToken)
    EnumerateStateNamesAsync(ActorId, CancellationToken)

    Creates an enumerable of all the state names associated with specified actor.

    Task<IEnumerable<string>> EnumerateStateNamesAsync(ActorId actorId, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function EnumerateStateNamesAsync(actorId As ActorId, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of String))

    Parameters

    • actorId
      ActorId
      ActorId

      ID of the actor for which to create enumerable.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task<IEnumerable<String>>
      Task(Of IEnumerable(Of String))

      A task that represents the asynchronous enumeration operation. The value of TResult parameter is an enumerable of all state names associated with specified actor.

    Exceptions

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    Remarks

    The enumerator returned from actor state provider is safe to use concurrently with reads and writes to the state provider. It represents a snapshot consistent view of the state provider.

  • Edit
    GetActorsAsync(Int32, ContinuationToken, CancellationToken)
    GetActorsAsync(Int32, ContinuationToken, CancellationToken)

    Gets ActorIds from the State Provider.

    Task<PagedResult<ActorId>> GetActorsAsync(int numItemsToReturn, ContinuationToken continuationToken, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Function GetActorsAsync(numItemsToReturn As Integer, continuationToken As ContinuationToken, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of PagedResult(Of ActorId))

    Parameters

    • numItemsToReturn
      Int32
      Int32

      Number of items requested to be returned.

    • continuationToken
      ContinuationToken
      ContinuationToken

      A continuation token to start querying the results from. A null value of continuation token means start returning values form the beginning.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task<PagedResult<ActorId>>
      Task(Of PagedResult(Of ActorId))

      A task that represents the asynchronous operation of call to server.

    Exceptions

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    Remarks

    The continuationToken is relative to the state of actor state provider at the time of invocation of this API. If the state of actor state provider changes (i.e. new actors are activated or existing actors are deleted) in between calls to this API and the continuation token from previous call (before the state was modified) is supplied, the result may contain entries that were already fetched in previous calls.

    LoadRemindersAsync(CancellationToken)

    Loads all the reminders contained in the actor state provider.

    Task<IActorReminderCollection> LoadRemindersAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function LoadRemindersAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of IActorReminderCollection)

    Parameters

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      Cancellation token for asynchronous load operation.

    Returns

    • Task<IActorReminderCollection>
      Task(Of IActorReminderCollection)

      A task that represents the asynchronous load operation. The value of TResult parameter is a collection of all actor reminders contained in the actor state provider.

    Exceptions

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    LoadStateAsync<T>(ActorId, String, CancellationToken)
    LoadStateAsync(Of T)(ActorId, String, CancellationToken)

    Loads the actor state associated with the specified state name.

    Task<T> LoadStateAsync<T>(ActorId actorId, string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function LoadStateAsync(Of T)(actorId As ActorId, stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of T)

    Parameters

    • actorId
      ActorId
      ActorId

      ID of the actor for which to load the state.

    • stateName
      String
      String

      Name of the actor state to load.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task<T>
      Task(Of T)

      A task that represents the asynchronous load operation. The value of TResult parameter contains value of actor state associated with given state name.

    Exceptions

    • KeyNotFoundException
      KeyNotFoundException

      Actor state associated with specified state name does not exist.

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    • actorId

      ActorId

      IActorReminder
      IActorReminder

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A task that represents the asynchronous reminder callback completed notification processing.

    SaveReminderAsync(ActorId, IActorReminder, CancellationToken)
    SaveReminderAsync(ActorId, IActorReminder, CancellationToken)

    Saves the specified actor reminder. If an actor reminder with given name does not exist, it adds the actor reminder otherwise existing actor reminder with same name is updated. 

    Task SaveReminderAsync(ActorId actorId, IActorReminder reminder, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function SaveReminderAsync(actorId As ActorId, reminder As IActorReminder, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

    Parameters

    • actorId
      ActorId
      ActorId

      ID of the actor for which to save the reminder.

    • reminder
      IActorReminder
      IActorReminder

      Actor reminder to save.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A task that represents the asynchronous save operation.

    Exceptions

    • OperationCanceledException

  • Edit
    SaveStateAsync(ActorId, IReadOnlyCollection<ActorStateChange>, CancellationToken)
    SaveStateAsync(ActorId, IReadOnlyCollection(Of ActorStateChange), CancellationToken)

    Saves the specified set of actor state changes atomically.

    Task SaveStateAsync(ActorId actorId, IReadOnlyCollection<ActorStateChange> stateChanges, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function SaveStateAsync(actorId As ActorId, stateChanges As IReadOnlyCollection(Of ActorStateChange), cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

    Parameters

    • actorId
      ActorId
      ActorId

      ID of the actor for which to save the state changes.

    • stateChanges
      IReadOnlyCollection<ActorStateChange>
      IReadOnlyCollection(Of ActorStateChange)

      Collection of state changes to save.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A task that represents the asynchronous save operation.

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException
      InvalidOperationException

      When StateChangeKind is None

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    Remarks

    The collection of state changes should contain only one item for a given state name. The save operation will fail on trying to add an actor state which already exists or update/remove an actor state which does not exist.

Represents the interface that an actor state provider needs to implement for
